column5: Found this while looking around on you tube. I sure hope these guys have some serious impact gear on because they're freakin movin!
be a bad time to blow a belt!
Looks like it would be quite the rush and a very smooth ride! That water is like glass.

this video has been around for a bit. Professional riders on high powered modified sleds. Still impressive. I ain't gonna try it with my 1990 Yamaha 410 EnticerT though. It would be glub, glub, glub.... for me within 50 ft.

and people are worried about ice sheds going through the ice early in the season...hmm what is worse a snow mobile at the bottom of the lake or a wooden hut. I think we need to take a look at the stupidity...sorry, if your on a sled and you go through a inch of ice or no ice at all....o well.
Highly modified sleds yes Tom.. professionals.. no.. just some grandkids of a very well to do Penetanguishene Local.
Personally no.. but I do know their grandfather personally.
